replies.msg:
Hey all, each time we update Score! Match we’ll be giving you a little more detail behind the changes and how they may impact your gameplay.



Gameplay



CHANGE – Tackle recharge time adjusted

The time it takes to recharge tackles is now significantly shorter. We’re making this change to address frustration we’ve seen from many players about feeling helpless as they watch their opponents score. This will introduce more opportunities to stop attacks and increase activity while you defend. As you might expect, this will influence attacking too, and we’ll be closely monitoring the situation to see how this affects overall enjoyment.



FIX – Better defending

Defenders will now mark attackers with better positioning and put in more effort to chase down attackers and loose passes.

FIX – Goalkeepers skill

Goalkeepers will now dive further and react faster.

FIX – Other gameplay improvements

We’ve made other small tweaks and bug fixes to make sure matches are as enjoyable as possible.



Other



FIX – Device issues and boot crashes

We’ve made some small changes to make sure the game runs properly on several devices that were experiencing problems recently. These devices should no longer crash when launching the game. If you are still experiencing problems with your device, please contact us at support@ftgames.com.

FIX – Other bug fixes

As usual, various other bug fixes have been made to ensure you have as smooth and enjoyable gameplay experience as possible.



Some of these changes are quite significant, so we’d love to hear your feedback on them.



Join Score! Match on Facebook: http://bit.ly/ScoreMatchFB
